author: Basil Black
text: I was working in the Chicago Loop area when it happened. I was 2 mos pregnant. We got the call to evacuate the Loop. We couldn’t make any calls to loved ones cuz cell towers were flooded. My train was full so I took a different one. We were so scared! #NeverForget
